name: Github Moonlight - INCOMPLETE
description:
WARNING: Incomplete and a tad buggy for now (because of globals and selectors instead of nests), I do intend on completing this as I use GitHub quite a lot and intend for it to fit my theme.

Pages Complete
- Code (file explorer thing)
- Dashboard
- Commits Page (could look nicer though)
- Issues Page (could look nicer though)
- Issue (I like it, has some glitches though)
- Pull Requests Page (could look nicer though)
- Pull Request (Same as Issue)

TODO:
Many things, oh my...
additional_info: v1.0.0 - Very jank build that somewhat works.
